text: un ke rasulo ne unhe kaha ke kya haq taâ€™ala ke baare mein tumhe shak hai jo aamaano aur zameen ka banane wala hai, wo tu tumhe is liye bula raha hai ke tumhare tamaam gunah maaf farma de aur ek muqarrar waqt tak tumhe mahullath ataa farmaye, unhone kaha ke tum to hum jaise hee insaan ho, tum chahte ho ke hamein un khudaao ki ibaadath se rok do jin ki ibaadath hamare baap dada karte rahe, accha to hamare saamne koi kholi daleel pesh karo
